get.description: Search companies, officers and disqualified officers

title.description: The title of the search result.

address_snippet.description: A single line address. This will be the address that matched within the indexed document or the primary address otherwise (as returned by the `address` member).

links.description: The URL of the search result.

self.description: The URL of the resource being returned by the search item.

snippet.description: Summary information for the result showing additional details that have matched.

matches.description: A list of members and arrays of character offset defining substrings that matched the search terms.

title.description: An array of character offset into the `title` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `title` that matched the search terms. The first character of the string is index 1.

snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `snippet` that matched the search terms. The first character of the string is index 1.

address_snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `address_snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `address_snippet` that matched the search terms.

kind.description: The type of search result. Refer to the full resource descriptions [CompanySearch resource](api/docs/company/company_number/CompanySearch-resource.html)  [OfficerSearch resource] (api/docs/company/company_number/OfficerSearch-resource.html) and [DisqualifiedOfficerSearch resource](api/docs/company/company_number/DisqualifiedOfficerSearch-resource.html) for the full list of members returned.

description_identifier.description: An array of enumeration types that make up the search description. See search_descriptions_raw.yaml in api-enumerations

address.description: The address of the company's registered office.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

total_results.description: The number of further search results available for the current search.

start_index.description: The index into the entire result set that this result page starts.

items_per_page.description: The number of search items returned per page.

kind.description: The type of search response returned.

items.description: The results of the completed search. See `items.kind` for details of each specific result resource returned.,

address_snippet.description: A single line address. This will be the address that matched within the indexed document or the primary address otherwise (as returned by the `address` member).

links.description: The URL of the search result.

self.description: The URL of the resource being returned by the search item.

snippet.description: Summary information for the result showing additional details that have matched.

title.description: An array of character offset into the `title` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `title` that matched the search terms. The first character of the string is index 1.

snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `snippet` that matched the search terms. The first character of the string is index 1.

address_snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `address_snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `address_snippet` that matched the search terms.

month.description: The month the officer was born in.

year.description: The year the officer was born in.

postal_code.description: The postal code. For example CF14 3UZ.

kind.description: Describes the type of result returned.

date_of_birth.description: The disqualified officer's date of birth.

description_identifiers.description: An array of enumeration types that make up the search description. See search_descriptions_raw.yaml in api-enumerations.

address.description: The address of the disqualified officer as provided by the disqualifying authority.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

postal_code.description: The postal code. For example CF14 3UZ.

total_results.description: The number of further search results available for the current search.

start_index.description: The index into the entire result set that this result page starts.

items_per_page.description: The number of search items returned per page.

effective_from.description: The string from which the company name was effective.

ceased_on.description: The string on which the company name ceased.

accounting_reference_date.description: The Accounting Reference Date (ARD) of the company.

made_up_to.description: The date the last company accounts were made up to.

type.description:
The type of the last company accounts filed.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `account_type` section in the [enumeration mappings](https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml).

next_due.description: The date the next company accounts are due.

next_made_up_to.description: The date the next company accounts should be made up to.

overdue.description: Flag indicating if the company accounts are overdue.

annual_return.description: Annual return information. This member is only returned if a confirmation statement has not be filed.

last_made_up_to.description: The date the last annual return was made up to.

next_due.description: The date the next annual return is due. This member will only be returned if a confirmation statement has not been filed and the date is before 28th July 2016, otherwise refer to `confirmation_statement.next_due`

next_made_up_to.description: The date the next annual return should be made up to. This member will only be returned if a confirmation statement has not been filed and the date is before 30th July 2016, otherwise refer to `confirmation_statement.next_made_up_to`

overdue.description: Flag indicating if the annual return is overdue.

can_file.description: Flag indicating whether this company can file.

last_made_up_to.description: The date to which the company last made a confirmation statement.

next_due.description: The date by which the next confimation statement must be received.

next_made_up_to.description: The date to which the company must next make a confirmation statement.

overdue.description: Flag indicating if the confirmation statement is overdue

jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction specifies the political body responsible for the company.

date_of_creation.description: The date when the company was created.

date_of_cessation.description: The date which the company was converted/closed or dissolved. Please refer to company status to determine which.

has_been_liquidated.description: The flag indicating if the company has been liquidated in the past.

has_charges.description: The flag indicating if the company has any charges.

is_community_interest_company.description: The flag indicating if the company is a Community Interest Company.

country.description: Country in which company was incorporated.

name.description: Identity of register in country of incorporation.

registration_number.description: Registration number in company of incorporation.

governed_by.description: Law governing the company in country of incorporation.

company_type.description: Legal form of the company in the country of incorporation.

is_a_credit_finance_institution.description: Is it a financial or credit institution.

account_period_from:.description: Date account period starts under parent law.

day.description: Day on which accounting period starts under parent law.

month.description: Month in which accounting period starts under parent law.

account_period_to.description: Date account period ends under parent law.

day.description: Day on which accounting period ends under parent law.

month.description: Month in which accounting period ends under parent law.

must_file_within.description: Time allowed from period end for disclosure of accounts under parent law.

months.description: Number of months within which to file.

business_activity.description: Type of business undertaken by the company.

foreign_account_type.description:
Type of accounting requirement that applies.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `foreign_account_type` section in the [enumeration mappings] (https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml).

terms_of_account_publication.description:
Describes how the publication date is derived.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `terms_of_account_publication` section in the [enumeration mappings] (https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml).

last_full_members_list_date.description: The date of last full members list update.

registered_office_address.description: The address of the company's registered office.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

previous_company_names.description: The previous names of this company.

company_status.description:
The status of the company.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `company_status` section in the [enumeration mappings] (https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml)

company_status_detail.description:
Extra details about the status of the company.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `company_status_detail` section in the [enumeration mappings](https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml).

type.description:
The type of the company.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `company_type` section in the [enumeration mappings](https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml)

has_insolvency_history.description: The flag indicating if the company has insolvency history.

undeliverable_registered_office_address.description: Flag indicating whether post can be delivered to the registered office.

registered_office_is_in_dispute.description: Flag indicating registered office address as been replaced.

branch_company_details.description: UK branch of a foreign company.

business_activity.description: Type of business undertaken by the UK establishment.

links.description: A set of URLs related to the resource, including self.

persons_with_significant_control.description: The URL of the persons with significant control list resource.

persons_with_significant_control_stateme.description: The URL of the persons with significant control statements list resource.

registers.description: The URL of the registers resource for this company

address.description: The correspondence address of the officer.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

appointed_on.description: The date on which the officer was appointed.

date_of_birth.description: Details of director date of birth.

day.description: The day of the date of birth.

month.description: The month of date of birth.

year.description: The year of date of birth.

links.description: Links to other resources associated with this officer list item.

self.description: Link to this officer list resource.

resigned_on.description: The date on which the officer resigned.

identification.description: Only one from `eea`, `non-eea`, `uk-limited` or `other-corporate-body-or-firm` can be supplied, not multiples of them.

legal_authority.description: The legal authority supervising the company.

legal_form.description: The legal form of the company as defined by its country of registration.

active_count.description: The number of active officers in this result set.

items_per_page.description: The number of officers to return per page.

links.description: Links to other resources associated with this officer list resource.

self.description: Link to this officer list resource.

resigned_count.description: The number of resigned officers in this result set.

start_index.description: The offset into the entire result set that this page starts.

total_results.description: The total number of officers in this result set.

address.description: The correspondence address of the officer.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

postal_code.description: The postal code. For example CF14 3UZ.

appointed_before.description: The date the officer was appointed before. Only present when the `is_pre_1992_appointment` attribute is `true`.

appointed_on.description: The date the officer was appointed.

appointed_to.description: The company information of the appointment.

company_name.description: The name of the company the officer is acting for.

company_number.description: The number of the company the officer is acting for.

company_status.description: The status of the company the officer is acting for.

name.description: The full name of the officer.

former_names.description: Former names for the officer, if there are any.

identification.description: Only one from `eea` or `non-eea` can be supplied, not both.

legal_authority.description: The legal authority supervising the company.

legal_form.description: The legal form of the company as defined by its country of registration.

is_pre_1992_appointment.description: Indicator representing if the officer was appointed before their appointment date.

links.description: Links to other resources associated with this officer appointment item.

company.description: Link to the company profile resource that this appointment is associated with.

name_elements.description: A document encapsulating the separate elements of a natural officer's name.

resigned_on.description: The date the officer was resigned.

date_of_birth.description: The officer's date of birth details.

month.description: The month the officer was born in.

year.description: The year the officer was born in.

is_corporate_officer.description: Indicator representing if the officer is a corporate body.

items_per_page.description: The number of officer appointments to return per page.

links.description: Links to other resources associated with this officer appointment resource.

self.description: Link to this officer appointment resource.

name.description: The corporate or natural officer name.

start_index.description: The first row of data to retrieve, starting at 0. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the `items_per_page` parameter.

total_results.description: The total number of officer appointments in this result set.

<argument>.description: The element name and value pair required to complete the error description, will repeat as necessary.

location_type.description: Describes the type of location returned so that it may be parsed appropriately

location.description: The location in the submitted request in which the error relates. This parameter is only provided when errors[].type is set to "ch:validation".

error.description: The error being returned. See github for valid [enumeration types](https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/develop/errors.yml)

error_values.description: A collection of argument name and value pairs which, when substituted into the error string, provide the full description of the error. As many name/value pairs as necessary to complete the error description are returned. See example above.

NumberOfItems.name: items_per_page
NumberOfItems.description: Number of items per page for the results

CompanyNumber.name: companynumber
CompanyNumber.description: The company number of the basic information to return.

RegisterType.name: register_type
RegisterType.description: The register_type determines which officer type is returned for the registers view.The register_type field will only work if registers_view is set to true

RegisterView.name: register_view
RegisterView.description: Display register specific information. If given register is held at Companies House, registers_view set to true and correct register_type specified, only active officers will be returned. Those will also have full date of birth.Defaults to false

OrderByOfficers.name: order_by
OrderByOfficers.description: The field by which to order the result set.

OfficerId.name: officer_id
OfficerId.description: The officer id of the appointment list being requested.
